basics.name: Jonathan Bloomer
basics.label: Front End Developer
basics.summary: Having graduated from University with a Music degree I realised that my passion for composition with computer sequencers translated very well to programming and embarked on a journey of learning languages starting with html & css and later on Actionscript, php, SQL and javascript. Over the past 16 years I have continuously challenged myself with new languages, frameworks and methodologies. I have a keen interest in full stack development with Meteor and React as well as Typescript and Polymer as you will see from my Github repos.

work.summary: Working as a UI developer as part of IAG Labs developing html/css/javascript solutions to integrate with the backend systems for the online quoting applications.
highlights: Became a certified SaFE Agile Practicioner
Developed a Google Polymer prototype as a solution to ongoing problems with backend teams using inconsistent markup
Started to transition existing jQuery plugins over to Typescript

work.summary: At Reactive I was responsible for working with a .NET team to deliver templates using javascript/sass/grunt and handlebars. I also had exposure to TFS for source control.

For City of Sydney I was a Front End Developer working with Wordpress on multiple key websites such as Sydneynewyearseve.com.au. All code was developed using LESS and Bootstrap for a consistent responsive interface.

As a freelance web developer I mainly concentrated on building bespoke CMS solutions for agencies using Wordpress. As a full stack developer my responsibilities included setting up hosting, domains, databases and delivering an easy to use custom Wordpress theme with Advanced Custom Fields and toward the latter end of my freelance venture, responsive layouts.
At SOAP I was required to carry out full stack duties across a broad range of projects including php/MySQL with front end technologies ranging from html/css to Flash.
Flash development with xml & amfphp for php/mysql integration.
Flash developer using xml & amfphp, html/css with php/mysql backend integration and CMS development.
Lead web developer on homehound.com.au, html/css/javascript development with php & SQL server integration.
